attributes.action: I require extensive action to tackle speeding vehicles in my area.
attributes.additional_details: I along with my mostly all of my neighbours have witnessed tragic accidents resulting in deaths and severe injury due to vehicles including motorcycles using the main road as a speed track. I have reached out to my local council to no avail. Its time we all took a stand to protect our families, children and each other.
attributes.background: As a local resident of Wood Lane (Martin's corner and The Fiddler's) Barking and Dagenham. I would like extensive action to be taken in the form of Speed cameras/high road humps to be placed in this high risk area, where I have witnessed deaths and terrible accidents right outside my home.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for. 
 
Relevant decisions are a matter for Barking & Dagenham council, not the UK Government or Parliament. 

You could start a similar petition with Barking and Dagenham council: https://www.lbbd.gov.uk/council-and-democracy/get-involved/petitions
